resources.string: Welcome to my first mobile app! My name is Lucas Bandeira. I am 26 years old originally from Brazil. I am also a Computer Science student in Dorset College.
I hope you enjoy your experience using my first mobile application!
\u00a9 Copyright Lucas Bandeira 2022, made with Android Studio

I am a second year Bachelors student of computer science in Dorset College. Throughout the past two years I have seen a fair number of technologies and developing softwares, however I have intentions of specializing myself in front end development in the future.
Hopefully I will be able to graduate in the first semester of 2023 which makes me course even more exciting, knowing the challanges and opportunities that await for me

Before moving to Ireland, I used to study civil engineering, but after 2 years I realized that I would not enjoy working in the area. Tha was the starting point of moving abroad and then start my studies from the start!
Here are some areas that I have seen so far and some softwares that I know how to use.
